title: Autograd fixes
body_html:
WARNING: This PR changes the default of requires_grad flag in Variables. It can possibly break a bunch of code, but is a more reasonable default, since most Variables created explicitly by users don't really require grad.

Do not merge. This PR is only for review and test purposes.
body_text:
WARNING: This PR changes the default of requires_grad flag in Variables. It can possibly break a bunch of code, but is a more reasonable default, since most Variables created explicitly by users don't really require grad.
Do not merge. This PR is only for review and test purposes.
body:
**WARNING: This PR changes the default of `requires_grad` flag in Variables.** It can possibly break a bunch of code, but is a more reasonable default, since most Variables created explicitly by users don't really require grad.

**Do not merge. This PR is only for review and test purposes.**
